languages.text: "Нечисти вроде в развалинах нет никакой, но сами они того — еле держатся. Пару отсеков отсюда и все, вы и шагу не ступите без страха, что вас неисправный реактор не зажарит или отсек не разгерметизируется. Ну, нам к таким местам не привыкать. Ковыряем потихоньку. А уж что это за корабль, чей он был — то нам неведомо".

traits.locale_text: "Нечисти вроде в развалинах нет никакой, но сами они того — еле держатся. Пару отсеков отсюда и все, вы и шагу не ступите без страха, что на вас сверху что-то не упадет или под вами пол не подломится. Ну, нам к таким местам не привыкать. Ковыряем потихоньку. А уж что это за корабль, чей он был — то нам неведомо".
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Doesn't seem like there's anything nasty living inside the wreck now, but the wreck itself is barely holding together. You go a couple of modules from here — and that's it, you won't take another step without fearing that a broken reactor might cook you alive, or a whole module might depressurise. Well, it's nothing we haven't handled before, so we're having a poke at it. But we don't have a clue what this ship is or who it belonged to."
languages.original_text: "Нечисти вроде в развалинах нет никакой, но сами они того — еле держатся. Пару отсеков отсюда и все, вы и шагу не ступите без страха, что вас неисправный реактор не зажарит или отсек не разгерметизируется. Ну, нам к таким местам не привыкать. Ковыряем потихоньку. А уж что это за корабль, чей он был — то нам неведомо".

traits.locale_text: "Doesn't seem like there's anything nasty living inside the wreck now, but the wreck itself is barely holding together. You go a couple of modules from here — and that's it, you won't take another step without fearing that a broken reactor might cook you alive or a whole module might depressurize. Well, it's nothing we haven't handled before, so we're having a poke at it. But we don't have a clue what this ship is or who it belonged to."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

traits.locale_text: "Doesn't seem like there's anything nasty living inside the wreck now, but the wreck itself is barely holding together. You go a couple of modules from here — and that's it, you won't take another step without fearing that a broken reactor might cook you alive or a whole module might depressurize. Well, it's nothing we haven't handled before, so we're having a poke at it. But we don't have a clue what this ship is or who it belonged to."

Well, it's nothing we haven't handled before, so we're having a poke at it. But we don't have a clue what this ship is or who it belonged to."

You go a couple of modules from here — and that's it, you won't take another step without fearing that a broken reactor might cook you alive, or a whole module might depressurise. traits.locale_text: "Doesn't seem like there's anything nasty living inside the wreck now, but the wreck itself is barely holding together. You go a couple of modules from here — and that's it, you won't take another step without fearing that a broken reactor might cook you alive, or a whole module might depressurise. Well, it's nothing we haven't handled before, so we're having a poke at it. But we don't have a clue what this ship is or who it belonged to."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: “现在看来，这堆残骸里好像没什么可怕的玩意儿，但这个地方真的很不结实。您可以往前走上几片船区，但不能再往前走了。如果继续往前走，损坏的反应堆就可能会爆炸，把您活活烧死，或者船舱突然减压，把您憋死。不过，这些情况我们以前都遇到过，所以我们也正在慢慢探路。不过，我们完全不清楚这艘船叫什么名字，也不知道之前的船长是谁。”
languages.original_text: "Doesn't seem like there's anything nasty living inside the wreck now, but the wreck itself is barely holding together. You go a couple of modules from here — and that's it, you won't take another step without fearing that a broken reactor might cook you alive, or a whole module might depressurise. Well, it's nothing we haven't handled before, so we're having a poke at it. But we don't have a clue what this ship is or who it belonged to."

traits.locale_text: “现在看来，这堆残骸里好像没什么可怕的玩意儿，但这个地方真的很不结实。您可以往前走上几片船区，但不能再往前走了。如果继续往前走，损坏的反应堆就可能会爆炸，把您活活烧死，或者船舱突然减压，把您憋死。不过，这些情况我们以前都遇到过，所以我们也正在慢慢探路。不过，我们完全不清楚这艘船叫什么名字，也不知道之前的船长是谁。”
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: «No parece que haya nada peligroso viviendo dentro de la nave, pero su estructura apenas se sostiene. Puedes avanzar otro par de módulos desde aquí, pero nada más. No puedes dar otro paso sin miedo a que un reactor roto te cueza o que el módulo se despresurice. En fin, no es nada nuevo para nosotros, así que estamos tanteando, pero no tenemos ni idea de qué es la nave ni de quién era».
languages.original_text: "Doesn't seem like there's anything nasty living inside the wreck now, but the wreck itself is barely holding together. You go a couple of modules from here — and that's it, you won't take another step without fearing that a broken reactor might cook you alive, or a whole module might depressurise. Well, it's nothing we haven't handled before, so we're having a poke at it. But we don't have a clue what this ship is or who it belonged to."

traits.locale_text: «No parece que haya nada peligroso viviendo dentro de la nave, pero su estructura apenas se sostiene. Puedes avanzar otro par de módulos desde aquí, pero nada más. No puedes dar otro paso sin miedo a que un reactor roto te cueza o que el módulo se despresurice. En fin, no es nada nuevo para nosotros, así que estamos tanteando, pero no tenemos ni idea de qué es la nave ni de quién era».
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: 「今のところ、難破船の中に厄介なものが住んでいるようには見えませんが、船自体かろうじてその形を保ってるような状態です。ここからいくつかのモジュール分進むだけ、それで終わりです。原子炉が壊れるのを恐れることなく次の一歩を踏み出すことなどできません。生きたまま調理されるかもしれないし、モジュール全体が減圧されるかもしれない。まあ、私たちがこれまでに扱ったことのないものなので、少しずつ、つついているところですよ。でも、この船が何なのか、誰のものなのかはまったくわかりません」
languages.original_text: "Doesn't seem like there's anything nasty living inside the wreck now, but the wreck itself is barely holding together. You go a couple of modules from here — and that's it, you won't take another step without fearing that a broken reactor might cook you alive, or a whole module might depressurise. Well, it's nothing we haven't handled before, so we're having a poke at it. But we don't have a clue what this ship is or who it belonged to."

traits.locale_text: 「今のところ、難破船の中に厄介なものが住んでいるようには見えませんが、船自体かろうじてその形を保ってるような状態です。ここからいくつかのモジュール分進むだけ、それで終わりです。原子炉が壊れるのを恐れることなく次の一歩を踏み出すことなどできません。生きたまま調理されるかもしれないし、モジュール全体が減圧されるかもしれない。まあ、私たちがこれまでに扱ったことのないものなので、少しずつ、つついているところですよ。でも、この船が何なのか、誰のものなのかはまったくわかりません」
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Jetzt scheint in dem Wrack nichts Übles mehr zu leben, aber es wird bald auseinanderfallen. Wenn Ihr von hier aus nur ein paar Module weitergeht, ist es vorbei, dann müsst Ihr bei jedem Schritt fürchten, dass ein kaputter Reaktor Euch kocht oder in einem ganzen Modul der Druck abfällt. Wir kennen uns mit so was aus und riskieren es trotzdem. Aber wir haben keine Ahnung, was das für ein Schiff ist oder wem es gehört hat."
languages.original_text: "Doesn't seem like there's anything nasty living inside the wreck now, but the wreck itself is barely holding together. You go a couple of modules from here — and that's it, you won't take another step without fearing that a broken reactor might cook you alive, or a whole module might depressurise. Well, it's nothing we haven't handled before, so we're having a poke at it. But we don't have a clue what this ship is or who it belonged to."

traits.locale_text: "Jetzt scheint in dem Wrack nichts Übles mehr zu leben, aber es wir bald auseinanderfallen. Wenn Ihr von hier aus nur ein paar Module weitergeht, ist es vorbei, dann müsst Ihr bei jedem Schritt fürchten, dass ein kaputter Reaktor Euch kocht oder in einem ganzen Modul der Druck abfällt. Wir kennen uns mit so was aus und riskieren es trotzdem. Aber wir haben keine Ahnung, was das für ein Schiff ist oder wem es gehört hat."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: « A priori, il ne reste plus rien de méchant à l'intérieur, mais l'épave tient à peine debout. On peut seulement explorer les deux premiers modules à partir d'ici. Impossible d'aller plus loin sans risquer de se faire griller vif par un réacteur défaillant, ou qu'un module tout entier se dépressurise. On a l'habitude de ce genre de situation, nous, c'est pas ça qui va nous arrêter. Mais pour ce qui est de savoir ce qu'est ce vaisseau et à qui il appartenait, on n'en a aucune idée. »
languages.original_text: "Doesn't seem like there's anything nasty living inside the wreck now, but the wreck itself is barely holding together. You go a couple of modules from here — and that's it, you won't take another step without fearing that a broken reactor might cook you alive, or a whole module might depressurise. Well, it's nothing we haven't handled before, so we're having a poke at it. But we don't have a clue what this ship is or who it belonged to."

traits.locale_text: « A priori, il ne reste plus rien de méchant à l'intérieur, mais l'épave tient à peine debout. On peut seulement explorer les deux premiers modules à partir d'ici. Impossible d'aller plus loin sans risquer de se faire griller vif par un réacteur défaillant, ou qu'un module tout entier se dépressurise. On a l'habitude de ce genre de situation, nous, c'est pas ça qui va nous arrêter. Mais pour ce qui est de savoir ce qu'est ce vaisseau et à qui il appartenait, on n'en a aucune idée. »
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Artık enkazın içinde başımıza dert olacak bir şey yaşamıyor sanki ama enkazın kendisi de ha parçalandı ha parçalanacak gibi. Bu odadan birkaç modül öteye gidince bozuk bir reaktör bizi diri diri yakar mı yoksa modülün tamamında basınç düşer mi... Güvenemiyorsun işte. Gerçi daha önce halledemediğimiz sıkıntılar değil, o yüzden şöyle bir bakınıyoruz. Yine de bu gemi neyin nesidir, kimin malıdır, hiçbir fikrimiz yok."
languages.original_text: "Doesn't seem like there's anything nasty living inside the wreck now, but the wreck itself is barely holding together. You go a couple of modules from here — and that's it, you won't take another step without fearing that a broken reactor might cook you alive, or a whole module might depressurise. Well, it's nothing we haven't handled before, so we're having a poke at it. But we don't have a clue what this ship is or who it belonged to."
